column1: #dig This is the dig blueprint for a South-North-South repeatable screw pump tower.\n\nOn the bottom level
column2: water is taken up from the South channeled tile. On the top level
column3:
water will exit the pump onto the tile directly South of the pump. See the DF wiki for a detailed explanation of screw pump technology.

Every repetition of this blueprint completes 2 z-levels of tower.

IMPORTANT: Start from the top z-level and repeat (Alt+R) down. Then on the bottommost level
column4: change the upper channel designation to mine. This allows the placement of the bottommost screw pump.
